title: Butterbean and vegetable stew
description: Perfect for when time is short, this vegetarian one-pot is crying out to have big chunks of baguette dipped in it.
ingredients: 2 x 400g tins butterbeans, drained and rinsed
Â½ large bunch fresh flatleaf parsley, chopped

method.Step 1: Heat a glug of oil in a large flameproof casserole over a medium heat. Add the onions and fry for 2-3 minutes, then add the garlic and carrots. Fry for a further 5-10 minutes until the carrots start to soften.

method.Step 2: Add the passata along with 200ml water and a pinch of sugar. Bring to a simmer and bubble for 5 minutes, then add the spinach and beans. Simmer for a further 10 minutes until hot, then taste and season with salt and pepper.

method.Step 3: Stir through the parsley and basil, then serve in bowls with crusty baguette slices.
